name: Khulchgar Dragonling
text:
Flying
When Khulchgar Dragonling enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a non-Dragonling creature enters the battlefield under your control, return Khulchgar Dragonling to its owner’s hand. 
Whenever a non-Dragonling creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, remove a +1/+1 counter from Khulchgar Dragonling..
